attributes.action: Stop aid to India, and spend on our own British citizens instead.
attributes.additional_details:
I, and the undersigned, propose our Government to stop all aid to India. India is now in a position to look after its own citizens given its rising economic status.

India has nuclear weapons and a space programme, bearing this in mind our taxes should not be given to India, and should instead be spent on the vulnerable and needy in our country.
